defaultRecipes.name: Homemade Pizza
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Roll out the pizza dough|2. Spread tomato sauce|3. Add cheese and pepperoni|4. Bake in the oven

defaultRecipes.name: Greek Salad
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Dice cucumbers and tomatoes|2. Crumble feta cheese|3. Combine all ingredients in a bowl|4. Drizzle with olive oil

defaultRecipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Mix flour and cocoa powder|2. Cream butter and sugar|3. Beat in eggs|4. Bake in a preheated oven

defaultRecipes.name: Caprese Salad
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella|2. Arrange slices on a plate|3. Tuck basil leaves between slices|4. Drizzle with balsamic glaze

defaultRecipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces|2. Stir-fry chicken in sesame oil|3. Add broccoli and bell peppers|4. Mix in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic

defaultRecipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions|2. Dice avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion|3. Combine cooked quinoa and diced vegetables|4. Squeeze lemon juice, drizzle olive oil, and season with salt and pepper

defaultRecipes.name: Margherita Pizza
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Roll out the pizza dough|2. Spread tomato sauce|3. Arrange fresh mozzarella slices|4. Tuck basil leaves on top|5. Bake in the oven

defaultRecipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Rinse and soak basmati rice|2. Sauté spices in ghee|3. Add mixed vegetables and rice|4. Cook until rice is tender

defaultRecipes.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Sauté minced garlic in butter|2. Add shrimp and cook until pink|3. Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp|4. Garnish with chopped parsley

defaultRecipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions|2. Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan|3. Sauté pancetta until crispy|4. Toss cooked pasta in egg mixture

defaultRecipes.name: Vegetarian Tacos
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Heat tortillas in a skillet|2. Fill with a mix of black beans, corn, and diced avocado|3. Top with lettuce and salsa|4. Serve warm

defaultRecipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Stir-fry beef strips in sesame oil|2. Add broccoli and carrots|3. Pour in soy sauce and toss until cooked|4. Serve hot

defaultRecipes.name: Berry Parfait
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola in a glass|2. Repeat layers until the glass is filled|3. Drizzle honey on top|4. Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.name: One Pan Pasta
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Boil pasta according to package instructions.|2. In a pan, saute minced garlic in olive oil until fragrant.|3. Add halved cherry tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Cook until tomatoes soften|4. Mix in the cooked pasta. Add fresh basil if available.

defaultRecipes.name: Stir-Fry Rice Bowl
ingredients: Protein of choice(tofu, chicken, shrimp, etc)
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Cook rice according to package instructions.|2. In a pan, stir-fry the protein and mixed vegetables with soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic powder.|3. Mix in the cooked rice until well combined.

defaultRecipes.name: Quesadillas
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Place a tortilla in a pan over medium heat.|2. Sprinkle shredded cheese on one half of the tortilla.|3. Add cooked chicken or beans on top of the cheese.|4. Fold the tortilla in half and press down. Cook until the cheese melts.|5. Serve with salsa if desired.

defaultRecipes.name: Microwave Mug Omelette
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. In a microwave-safe mug, whisk together eggs and a splash of milk.|2. Stir in diced vegetables, cheese, salt, and pepper.|3. Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring between each, until the eggs are fully cooked.

defaultRecipes.name: Peanut Butter Banana Wrap
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Spread peanut butter on tortilla.|2. Place banana slices on one side of the tortilla.|3. Drizzle with honey if desired.|4. Fold the tortilla and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.name: Vegetarian Chickpea Salad
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. In a bowl, combine chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.|2. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.|3. Season with salt and pepper.|4. Toss to combine

defaultRecipes.name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Cook pasta according to package instructions.|2. Drain the pasta and mix in pesto sauce.|3. Add halved cherry tomatoes and grated Parmesan cheese.|4. Toss to combine

defaultRecipes.name: Black Bean and Corn Quesadillas
ingredients: Canned black beans, drained and rinsed
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. In a pan, warm black beans and corn.|2. Place a tortilla in the pan, add beans, corn, and shredded cheese.|3. Top with another tortilla and cook until the cheese melts.|4. Serve with salsa.

defaultRecipes.name: Caprese Sandwich
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Slice the baguette and layer with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil leaves.|2. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and pepper.

defaultRecipes.name: Microwave Baked Potato
ingredients: Toppings of your choice(sour cream, cheese, chives)
defaultRecipes.recipe: |1. Pierce the potatoes with a fork and rub with olive oil, salt, and pepper.|2. Microwave on high for 8-10 minutes or until tender.|3. Add your favorite toppings.

defaultRecipes.name: Banana Oat Pancakes
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Mash banana
2. Whisk in eggs, salt, and oats
3. Cook for about two minutes
4. Enjoy!
